about_the_game:
Explore the Haunting World of "Gloomy Tales: One-Way Ticker DLC"! Step into the eerie embrace of a big, historical mansion and mystical train in four gripping episodes, each laden with secrets waiting to be uncovered! This spine-tingling DLC is not for the faint of heart, featuring bonus chapters, additional locations, and unknown mysteries that will leave you spellbound. Witness the unthinkable as a monster known as Allister snatches your friend Millie, spiriting her away through a portal to the dreaded world of the dead. Now, you must summon your courage and embark on a perilous journey to save her life. But you won't be alone in this treacherous realm!

Immerse yourself in this heart-pounding Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure, where every corner holds a clue and every puzzle piece brings you closer to the truth. "Gloomy Tales: One-Way Ticker DLC" promises an unforgettable journey into the unknown, where bravery is your greatest weapon!

🎈 COSTUME PARTY!
What's Halloween without some colorful and daring outfits? They say it's the only day of the year when you can be whoever you want to be!

🎈 DISCOVER MORE ABOUT GHOSTS!
Uncover the mysteries of the spectral world and unlock hidden knowledge that may aid you in your quest!

🎈 FIND OUT MORE ABOUT FACELESS!
Discover the key to opening the visitor's register to uncover valuable information. Piece together the clues hidden within the restaurant wagon to unveil the secrets of Faceless!

🎈 SEEK UNCLE HENRY'S HIDDEN DIARY!
Embark on a quest to locate the diary that Uncle Henry concealed within Emmett's bedroom, deciphering cryptic notes along the way!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Dare to face the darkness, uncover the secrets, and emerge victorious in the face of the unknown. The adventure awaits – are you ready to embark on it?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
